thread.title: Alibaba’s comedy talent hunt, Spontaneity, returns February
thread.title_full: Alibaba’s comedy talent hunt, Spontaneity, returns February

author: Okogba
title: Alibaba’s comedy talent hunt, Spontaneity, returns February
text:
Home » Entertainment » Alibaba’s comedy talent hunt, Spontaneity, returns February Alibaba’s comedy talent hunt, Spontaneity, returns February On 6:20 am In Entertainment by Okogba Comments 
BY ROTIMI AGBANA 
Acclaimed father of Nigerian comedy, Alibaba, has announced that his annual comedy talent show, ‘Alibaba’s Spontaneity’, will now be a monthly event. Ali Baba 
In a post on his Instagram page, the veteran comedian disclosed that he has decided to make the comedy talent hunt a monthly thing. 
“Alibabasspontaneity returns next month, and this time around its going to be monthly #january1stconcert”, Alibaba announced. Why the grandmaster of Nigerian comedy has made such a decision still remains a mystery to unravel. Querying this new development, Showtime Bonus asked Alibaba why he decided to stage the talent hunt on a monthly basis and how he intends to fund it, but as at press time, his response was not forthcoming. Okogba
